name: Mato Kurenai Yuugekitai: Daybreak Special Gigs
name_original: Mato Kurenai Yuugekitai: Daybreak Special Gigs
description:
Mato Kurenai Yuugekitai: Daybreak Special Gigs is an adventure game developed by Arc System Works. It came out on 26-11-2015. Arc System Works published the game.
Mato Kurenai Yuugekitai: Daybreak Special Gigs is available on PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4 and PS Vita.
